allow: Bash(npm view @astrojs/vercel version 2>&1 && npm view astro version 2>&1)
Bash(npm view @sanity/client version && npm view sanity version22222)
Bash(npm view react version && npm view sanity@"^4.0.0" version 2>&1 | head -522)

Bash(file /Users/ericahome/ryzo-studio/public/images/RyzoLogo_Brigher_WordsOnly.png && python3 -c "
from PIL import Image
img = Image.open\('/Users/ericahome/ryzo-studio/public/images/RyzoLogo_Brigher_WordsOnly.png'\)
print\('Mode:', img.mode\)
print\('Has alpha:', img.mode in \('RGBA', 'LA'\) or 'transparency' in img.info\)
" 2>/dev/null || python3 -c "
import struct, zlib
with open\('/Users/ericahome/ryzo-studio/public/images/RyzoLogo_Brigher_WordsOnly.png','rb'\) as f:
    sig = f.read\(8\)
    while True:
        length = struct.unpack\('>I', f.read\(4\)\)[0]
        chunk = f.read\(4\).decode\('ascii'\)
        data = f.read\(length\)
        f.read\(4\)
        if chunk == 'IHDR':
            print\('Color type:', data[9]\)  # 6=RGBA, 2=RGB, 4=gray+alpha
            break
" 2>/dev/null)

Bash(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:4321/mission 2>/dev/null && echo " | mission" && curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:4321/rage-fighters 2>/dev/null && echo " | rage-fighters" && curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:4321/about 2>/dev/null && echo " | about")

Bash(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:4321/events 2>/dev/null && echo " | events" && curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:4321/activations 2>/dev/null && echo " | activations")
